name: Clubby The Clay Ball
description:
Clubby The ClayBall must stop the fire from turning him into a brick. I do not want to be a brick. This was made for the Bean Jam #9 but was not submitted due to unforeseen issues when trying to submit however the game was still ready for the jam on time and was made in 3 hours. Link to the Bean Jam 9 Is below.

https://itch.io/jam/bean-jam-9
